page.title: Graphical Analysis
page.subtitle: Decode price action with dynamic charts, pattern recognition, and visual trends—trade every move with clarity and confidence.

video.aria: Technical analysis uses price charts, patterns, and indicators to anticipate future price movements.

bullets: Graphical analysis studies price behavior through charts, visual patterns, and drawing tools to anticipate likely market moves.
It emphasizes visual signals—trend lines, support/resistance, volume profiles, and overlays—to spot momentum shifts and time entries/exits.
Traders apply graphical analysis across assets—stocks, crypto, forex, and commodities—for clear, fast decision-making.
